meanings.definition: Not relating to or characteristic of a utility.
meanings.sent1: The nonutility company focused on creating art rather than providing services.
meanings.sent2: The new park was a nonutility addition to the neighborhood.
meanings.sent3: The nonutility paint colors on the walls made the room look like a rainbow.
meanings.sent4: Her nonutility approach to problem-solving was like a breath of fresh air.
meanings.sent5: The nonutility design of the building stood out among the traditional structures.

meanings.definition: Not serving a public utility function.
meanings.sent1: The nonutility vehicle was used for personal trips only.
meanings.sent2: The small garden was a nonutility space, meant for relaxation.
meanings.sent3: The nonutility toaster was only good for toasting marshmallows.
meanings.sent4: His nonutility role in the project was like a hidden gem waiting to be discovered.
meanings.sent5: The nonutility nature of the gadget made it unique in the market.
